contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox UK place | country = England | latitude = 52.73587 | longitude = 1.46767 | os_grid_reference = TG342210 | official_name = Neatishead | population = 537 | area_total_km2 = 7.71 | static_image = [[Image:Neatishead 024654 f6398b46-by-GaryReggae.jpg|240px]] | static_image_caption = Signpost in Neatishead | shire_district = [[North Norfolk]] | shire_county = [[Norfolk]] | region = East of England | civil_parish = Neatishead | constituency_westminster = | postcode_district = NR12 | postcode_area = NR | post_town = NORWICH | dial_code = | london_distance = }} '''Neatishead''' ({{IPAc-en|ˈ|n|i|t|s|t|ə|d}} {{respell|NEET|stəd}})<ref>G.M. Miller, ''BBC Pronouncing Dictionary of British Names'' (London: Oxford University Press, 1971), p. 108: "[This] is the traditional village pronunciation. [NEET-is-hed] is used by Service personnel for the local R.A.F. Station."</ref> is a [[village]] and [[civil parishes in England|civil parish]] in the [[England|English]] [[county]] of [[Norfolk]]. The village is situated some {{convert|20|km|abbr=on}} north-east of the city of [[Norwich]], within [[The Broads|The Norfolk Broads]] and to the west of [[Barton Broad]]. Access to Neatishead from the broad is by way of [[Limekiln Dyke]], a narrow channel leading off the broad.<ref>Ordnance Survey (2005). ''OS Explorer Map OL40 - The Broads''. ISBN 0-319-23769-9.</ref> The civil parish has an area of {{convert|7.71|km2|abbr=on}} and in the [[United Kingdom Census 2001|2001 census]] had a population of 537 in 235 households. For the purposes of local government, the parish falls within the [[Non-metropolitan district|district]] of [[North Norfolk]].<ref>Office for National Statistics & Norfolk County Council (2001). ''[http://www.norfolk.gov.uk/consumption/groups/public/documents/general_resources/ncc017867.xls Census population and household counts for unparished urban areas and all parishes]''. Retrieved December 2, 2005.</ref> It is famous due to the nearby [[RAF Neatishead]] radar station. == Notes == {{Reflist}} ==External links== {{Commons category|Neatishead}} {{oscoor gbx|TG342210}}. *[http://www.origins.org.uk/genuki/NFK/places/n/neatishead/ Information from Genuki Norfolk] on Neatishead. {{Civil Parishes of North Norfolk}} [[Category:North Norfolk]] [[Category:Norfolk Broads]] [[Category:Villages in Norfolk]] [[Category:Civil parishes in Norfolk]] {{Norfolk-geo-stub}}
